acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Virginia Department of Planning and Budget, Budget Operations Section, Records, Toni H. Jamison, Department of Planning and Budget, Patrick Henry Building, 1111 East Broad Street, Room 5005, Richmond, VA 23219, transferred 5 October 2010 and accessioned 7 October 2010.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection has been processed using minimal processing standards: the original arrangement has been maintained, the container list is brief and simple, and the records have not been refoldered and fasteners have not been removed.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Contains correspondence, subject files and reports created and collected by the Virginia Department of Planning and Budget (DPB). The files iclude budget instruction memorandums from the DPB, reports on capital projects (renovation of Virginia State Library and Archives-now called the Patrick Henry Building; and Virginia Veterans Care Center), reports on Indigent Care costs and miscellaneous studies.
